short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get Complete Information on Gardening/Farming/Agriculture Crops.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get complete information on growing crops. You can get project reports of different farming crops as well. Livestock rearing and other information related to Gardening is also available.
